website_summaries.verdict: Although you may not want to tackle steep or icy winter terrain in these snowshoes, they are worth considering for novices, occasional use, and budget-conscious shoppers.
pros: Affordable snowshoes that are easy to put on and take off
Earn praise for feeling reasonably lightweight when walking
Carrying bag and trekking poles included
cons: Not the best pick for extremely rugged trails, as the bindings frequently come loose and the traction is just OK

customer_reviews.title: No heel lift.
customer_reviews.text: Before you buy these, consider snow shoes that have back brackets (heel lifts) that most snow shoes should have to assist with incline climbing. Otherwise you will likely develop blisters and the trek up a hill will be considerably slower. I didn’t realize this brand did not include them in the design as I assumed all models had them. Otherwise, the snow shoes are exactly as promised though the red paint scratched off after just one use.
customer_reviews.author: Uyen Trinh

customer_reviews.title: These snowshoes are great! I bought them for myself
customer_reviews.text: These snowshoes are great! I bought them for myself. Easy to strap on and great for maneuverability and the shoes themselves are durable. On other snowshoes that I have had, getting turned around has always been a problem. With these it is not. I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: bookworm318

customer_reviews.title: plastic bindings probably fine for warmer winter areas but not northern MN
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to try these. As soon as I received, went out to try in 12 degree F temperature. Very disappointed as the plastic bindings were so cold they barely moved and I feared they would break. I struggled to get out of the binding and realized these were not the best choice for colder temps in northern MN. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: DDH

customer_reviews.title: They are a cheaper pair of snowshoes and would probably ...
customer_reviews.text: Flashtec made good on these snowshoes by shipping me another pair immediately after I posted my first review. The snowshoes work great for my use. I must have just gotten a pair that had that one flaw which happens with everything. They strap on easily and also easy to remove when you are done. Also, I would like to give kudo's to Flashtek for their immediately handling the problem as they did.
customer_reviews.author: Warren Hill

customer_reviews.title: Light weight great snow shoes
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous snow shoes. I like that it came with poles. No need to purchase the poles separately. Both shoes and poles are easy to use. Although this is the first time I've used snow shoes I had no problems putting them on and using them. They also had a very good instructional video. I found the shoes to be very comfortable to walk with on a 8 mile hike on a layer of new snowfall that we just got. I really enjoyed using them and cannot wait to go out with them again. I highly recommend them to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: King 55414

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and off.
customer_reviews.text: I've gone snowshoeing three times so far and I like these shoes. Very easy on and off. They don't loosen up after walking a while. Not too heavy for walking. Great pair of snowshoes for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good Basic Snowshoe
customer_reviews.text: I finally got around to testing these out. My wife and I went snowshoeing a few weekends ago for about two hours. These performed great, both in soft snow and icier conditions. In the soft snow they kept me from sinking too far and the metal cleat on the bottom kept me from slipping when traversing ice. The only thing I would like to see improved is the back strap. It held up fine but my foot seems to be too far back even with the back strap cinched all the way. I have a 10.5 size foot. This is why I only gave four stars. For the price though, these are fine.
customer_reviews.author: diverdude

customer_reviews.title: They are great for what you pay only have one question they ...
customer_reviews.text: They are great for what you pay only have one question they seem to make noise when you are walking not sure if this is from the material the bottom are made with. They have really nice straps on these mine never came with instructions I learned that they have a racket device which is very nice to tighten the straps
customer_reviews.author: Roland Sanders

customer_reviews.title: Looks Good But.....
customer_reviews.text: Good News First bc I'm an Optimist: It looks good..No, Great! It arrived within the 2-day Prime timing. This is for my adventure daughter's birthday and I think she will love it! Bad News: It was just delivered literally with the elongated box completely opened...taping tore open like someone went thru it! Everything looks intact, but it's upsetting and disturbing that my $75 gift is not REALLY brand new! Did whoever go thru the case where everything is located, too? Was it the UPS delivery guy? An Amazon worker who didn't package it well enough? It doesn't set well with me...despite this product probably being a 5-star rating!!!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: A Bargain at Twice the Price
customer_reviews.text: These are the first snowshoes I've had since snowshoeing with traditional snowshoes in Upstate New York in the '70s. Snowshoes have changed considerably in those 50 years. These Flashteks are excellent. We live in Wisconsin now and have an abundance of snow and places to go within minutes including right out the back door. These are easy to put on, and that is important to me because I have two artificial hips. They are very functional and enable us to move easily and confidently through deep snow. I have no reason to 'upgrade.' These Flashteks are affordable and are perfect for my wife and I to enjoy the snowy winter with great exercise.
customer_reviews.author: E.S. Kraay

customer_reviews.title: Good snowshoe
customer_reviews.text: My only issue with this snowshoe is that the upper back platform could have been rounded out just another 1/4". I will have my husband take his VERY sharp jack knife and shave a bit off. One of the teeth on the crampon 'clicked' the platform and made for a very noisy walk in the quiet woods. This may be an isolated incident so I would not let it stop anyone from buying these. That being said, this is a good snowshoe for trekking though snow in the woods. I have hiked minor hills and ridges but have not yet put them to the test of a high peak. I don't see why they would not do well!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Blanchard

customer_reviews.title: Very nice product, great gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this snowshoes for my friend who like hiking as the birthday gift , she likes it so much and told the quality is excellent. The package include the poles and gaiters, very good match for hiking and great value to buy, I am so happy to choose it as the gift it looks more expensive than the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kutie

customer_reviews.title: Experienced a slight problem with the shoes at first but ...
customer_reviews.text: Experienced a slight problem with the shoes at first but their customer service is more than satisfactory in my mind! No questions asked we have a new pair coming so my wife can continuing enjoying using them. Thank you Flashtek! John Sr Ely Mn.
customer_reviews.author: John schiltz sr

customer_reviews.title: Great first time snowshoes
customer_reviews.text: First time snowshoeing and found it easy to put on and walk with. Definitely not made to take off the groomed trails. The Teeth on the bottom dug in and kept me from slipping when going down hills..
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Good Snowshoes
customer_reviews.text: I like the snowshoes overall but, the clip on the back strap broke first time I used them. The clips are all plastic and broke pretty easily. I think it was partially my own fault so I did not want to give it too bad of a review. Besides the plastic clips the snowshoes seem to be pretty well made and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Tarpy

customer_reviews.title: Not a good experience
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets of these and used them in the Cascade Mountains today. My snowshoes were terrible since the straps constantly loosened. During a 5 hour hike I had to restrap/retighten these probably 30 times. My friend using the same shoes never had to retighten. I was surprised given the good reviews. Maybe I received a dud? Also, the round plastic thing on my pole broke off.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these snowshoes as a 70 year old Midwestern state woman looking for something different to pass the winter days. Didn’t want to spend tons of money because I wasn’t certain I would like snowshoeing or even be capable of doing it. These snowshoes were easy to put on & remained secure during the entire walk. They have the features needed for terrain snowshoeing! Great product & highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Sue M. Zablocki

customer_reviews.title: Wanted the uses for Special Olympics Winter Games
customer_reviews.text: These snowshoes would be good. I had trouble putting them on. I need more of a video showing me then telling me. I got this to see if I can use them for Special Olympics Winter games in Indiana. But I forgot to read the rules first. Which, they can only be 25 in. I would rather have the straps that are easier. The straps that are crossed and you just tighten them easy. Those are the ones I originally used. I think the Snowshoe was like a 21in. but I'll run now they would work if I lived in the mountains. But I don't, but it was good just to see a pair,
customer_reviews.author: jswim77

customer_reviews.title: but like I said this is my first pair
customer_reviews.text: These are my first pair of snow shoes and they are ok. The straps are a little long, which isn't a big deal, I just cut them. However, they come loose after a bit of hiking. The back strap can only be tightened so far because of the plastic heel part, I just slid my foot back more to make up for it. The plastic seems a little cheap as well, but like I said this is my first pair. I do love that it came with poles, definite plus. If I ever decide to upgrade I will definitely invest in a more fitted pair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed
customer_reviews.text: I used these to break a 6 mile trail in snow that was more than 1 ft. deep and they performed perfectly. Some people say they have had issues with the straps loosening, not me, the straps were as tight when I took them as when I put them on.
customer_reviews.author: Mh1023

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Love them, started snow shoeing last winter it is a blast, easy to put on and take off. They are easy to move around in, just make sure you order the correct size for your weight and what you will be packing total. I loved the fact that these gave me the information I needed for my husband and I, he is a big guy and has had no issues. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Iced up on cleats
customer_reviews.text: These snowshoes were very difficult to operate, the bindings were not nearly snug enough and EVERY metal part iced up excessively making it for a very long and slow trek.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent
customer_reviews.text: I've used the shoes a couple times with no real issues. They are definitely worth the price. The company also has great customer service. My gators ripped with my first wear and they gave me a credit towards a new set and I've had no further problems. Perfect to have for my occassional snow rompage.
customer_reviews.author: Lamina91

customer_reviews.title: good for my purpose
customer_reviews.text: I've only used them for walking on pretty even ground, but they are great for that. I didn't want to spend a ton of money and these serve my purpose. I didn't use the poles as we were collecting maple sap. Easy to maneuver even while carrying 5 gallon buckets.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Heel strap difficult to use
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to receive these snowshoes to replace a pair I have been using for 10 years. I like the ratcheting straps across the top. Unfortunately the clasp on the heel strap is nearly impossible to unfasten which is very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Kitty1

customer_reviews.title: Snow froze onto the crampons and heel; returning
customer_reviews.text: Loved that it came in a smaller size and with poles. However, after snowshoeing for about 2 hours, snow kept gathering on the crampon, as well as the heel, making the experience quite unpleasant and unstable. Required constant removal of snow to prevent it from getting stuck
customer_reviews.author: Alice Lim

customer_reviews.title: Good snowshoes, bad poles.
customer_reviews.text: Took these snowshoes out for the first time in January and they were easy to put on and use. However the poles would not stay secured after only a couple of hours of use. Very disappointed in these poles but the shoes were great.
customer_reviews.author: cece203

customer_reviews.title: easy to use and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: took up snow shoeing this winter and couldn't be more pleased with these snow shoes. They are easy to step into and strap. I didn't use the poles that came with the snow shoes since I have other poles I like better. I'm sure they work just fine
customer_reviews.author: Joss

customer_reviews.title: Great snowshoes
customer_reviews.text: Received the pair of snowshoes that I ordered for my wife. She loved that they are lightweight and easy to use. The straps are extremely easy to put on and take off. Also, she was also able to adjust the poles to fit her body size without any issues. Overall quality of the product is great and she can't wait to use them again next season!
customer_reviews.author: John Galli

customer_reviews.title: Snow shoes
customer_reviews.text: Shoes fit and worked very well. Straps on pole a little short for comfort. Cap at end of pole should be bigger for snow
customer_reviews.author: fohne

customer_reviews.title: Great Snowshoes!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and very sturdy! Used them in fresh powder and was very happy with the overall experience. The poles and bag are great too! Love these! Bought them as gifts too!
customer_reviews.author: eve

customer_reviews.title: Love our snowshoes
customer_reviews.text: We've now gone snowshoeing four times using our new snowshoes and even though the snow is extremely deep this year and quite powdery my wife "floats" over the snow. We are having a wonderful time staying in shape and seeing some truly beautiful country! The bindings are a snap to use and make getting them on and off a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Isaacson

customer_reviews.title: These snow shoes work well for their price point.
customer_reviews.text: These snow shoes work well for their price point. They're definitely not the nicest and most sturdy pair I've used. The telescoping pole design features two points of extension which doubles the chance of failure. The poles have been a bit of a pain to get open and closed in cold weather. In the future I would choose to spend more for a more sturdy pair. But if you'd be using them 1-3 X per winter, they are worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for our sons. Only used a couple of times but so far they have no complaints. They trekked across a lake for ice fishing and pulled a sled of equipment without issue.
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Rench

customer_reviews.title: Rear binding broke on first use
customer_reviews.text: These seem like decent snow shoes. They worked well for about 2 miles and then the rear/heel strap broke free of the rivet and can't be reassembled. Unfortunately, I didn't try them out for the first time until yesterday, which was two months after purchase, so the return date has passed. I'll probably try to fix them myself and see if (and how long that lasts).
customer_reviews.author: Olivedog

customer_reviews.title: Walking high above the snow, must have
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight ratcheting strap easy on n off snowshoes with poles n carry bag, priced excellent, free shipping
customer_reviews.author: Shagbark Hickory

customer_reviews.title: They work, allot better then just waking through the snow
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the 25" model, they work great, easy to put on and use
customer_reviews.author: Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Haven’t used them yet - appear to be good quality
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t actually used these yet. They appear to be good quality for what I need. I go a few times each winter just for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Linck

customer_reviews.title: Better products out there
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking but not easy to use. Top strap too short for even a 10 year olds shoe size
customer_reviews.author: MVS

customer_reviews.title: Snow build up making them difficult to use.
customer_reviews.text: Work great for a few steps then snow builds up in the ball of the foot, making it difficult and painful to walk in until snow is removed.
customer_reviews.author: Stevie77

customer_reviews.title: junk
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy , JUST A BUNCH OF JUNK . Spend a little more money & be much HAPPIER .
customer_reviews.author: William Waldusky

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get on and just go!
customer_reviews.text: Gift for my husband and he liked ease of putting on and overal use, though we have only tried on relatively flat areas , used once so far!
customer_reviews.author: MargaretA. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: The toe strap doesn't stay tight
customer_reviews.text: My first time out with these snowshoe the strap for the toe will not tighten on either snowshoe. There seems to be to much play in the ratchet that won't let it tighten. The snowshoe themselves are nice and light but having this strap not stay tight doesn't do me any good. My other snowshoes were 10 years old before the strap gave out.
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Great Snowshoes and poles.
customer_reviews.text: These Snowshoes worked great for back country hiking over fresh and packed snow!
customer_reviews.author: BGhas4

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my dad and he loves them! Thinks there are they best ones he has used so far, super easy to use and walk around in, he is in his late 60's.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Kreinz

customer_reviews.title: Ok, but certainly not great
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were super long. The aluminum poles are cheaper and we had to use our normal ski poles.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Hard working
customer_reviews.text: I use it for deep snow, around 3 feets. Works perfect. Never come out of your shoes like other snowshoes
customer_reviews.author: David I

customer_reviews.title: They Work Well
customer_reviews.text: As my first time out with snowshoes, I have nothing to compare them with but I would by them again. They kept me on top of the soft snow and I did not slip on any ice areas.
customer_reviews.author: JMpainter

customer_reviews.title: Great Snow Shoe
customer_reviews.text: This is my first time snow showing. These snow shoes are easy to put on and easy to adjust while you are wearing your snow boots. Easy to maneuver in, especially since I am new to this outdoor sport. The adjustable poles are very sturdy and adjust easy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Ammon

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy they are to put on and latch up. The ratchet straps are genius. I have used other shoes with standard straps and I definitely prefer these.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Beam

customer_reviews.title: Great Product! Get in those winter steps!
customer_reviews.text: Great snowshoe, does what it is supposed to do and looks great in the process. Had so much fun with these!!! With so many people with Fitbit steps, why not add this to the mix??
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great buy.
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied with these. Good for climbing. easy to get around in.
customer_reviews.author: Kurt Duerksen

customer_reviews.title: Great value and good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Used twice so far for the latest snowfalls and theybwork great. Good construction.
customer_reviews.author: Amy C.

customer_reviews.title: Xi xi
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a Xmas gift for my niece, vundebaar
customer_reviews.author: lois vogel

customer_reviews.title: Great snowshoes
customer_reviews.text: These are great snowshoes! Easy to use, light weight, and a great carrying bag. Three of use use these snowshoes and we snowshoe every weekend in the mountains.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: great deal for snowshoes
customer_reviews.text: We had a great snow this year so I had several opportunities to use these. I am a first time snowshoe'r and these work perfectly for my abilities.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Solid unit. One issue
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my mom. She loves them but just a couple uses and the bottom of one of the trekking poles came off. I will be buying replacement rubber End’s for her. Sounds like this is common on trekking poles
customer_reviews.author: carol maciej

customer_reviews.title: These are fun! We used ours for the first time today ...
customer_reviews.text: These are fun! We used ours for the first time today and we had so much fun, they have excellent stability. Also a huge puls is the customer service! If there is any issue at all they answer questions quickly and take care of it immediately. I highly recommend this seller and this snowshoe!
customer_reviews.author: Jenna ranger

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect! They are exactly what I was hoping for! Easy on and off
customer_reviews.author: jenifer

customer_reviews.title: high cost-performance value
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my first back country ride, it perform great during up hill and also down slope! light in weight, easy to handle for shoe on/ off. It valued higher than it cost, and it is great for beginner to intermediate level!
customer_reviews.author: Sally Fong

customer_reviews.title: Paint came off in just a few uses!
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice beginner set - comfortable and easy to use with nice accessories. My only complaint is that the paint is coming off after just a few uses!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: great snowshoes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my wife . She loves them , goes on easily, are very light .
customer_reviews.author: Don Weyand

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! So much fun to use! Nice carrying bag. Poles can be used for hiking as well.
customer_reviews.author: BigGrey107

customer_reviews.title: Lake Tahoe skiing trip
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our Lake Tahoe skiing trip, it turns out to be easy to use and i like to package arrived in good condition
customer_reviews.author: Chris.H

customer_reviews.title: Strap caught in ratchet mechanism
customer_reviews.text: Strap/ratchet mechanism very difficult to use. Maybe I got a lemon but unable to get the rubber strap out of both of the ratchets
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a gift for my father and they were worth every penny! He uses them East Coast winter snow without any problems!
customer_reviews.author: Olivia A

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Bought for my son and he really likes them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: So far have enjoyed these and graeat value and quality
customer_reviews.author: Lori Carls

customer_reviews.title: Great show shoes...
customer_reviews.text: Although I didn’t use these myself they seemed to be very well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Jack D Bohannan

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This This product is very good quality!Ithe weighs so light, easy to carry
customer_reviews.author: Kathyhuang

customer_reviews.title: Review for snow shoes
customer_reviews.text: Awesome - came in a bag... I used everything in Keystone, CO
customer_reviews.author: Debra Naro

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They work perfectly after a good size snow storm! Loved them!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Tofteroo

customer_reviews.title: Simple to use
customer_reviews.text: We actually opened the snow shoes in the car on the way to the mountain and slipped them on in the parking lot and off we went.
customer_reviews.author: alissa beck

customer_reviews.title: Finally have enough snow to enjoy several hikes
customer_reviews.text: Finally have enough snow to enjoy several hikes. These work great and the side rail is a great high end feature on a reasonably priced snow shoe!
customer_reviews.author: S. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Am new to snowshoeing, but these worked well; easy to put on too.
customer_reviews.author: DIANE S.

customer_reviews.title: First time snowshoeing
customer_reviews.text: Great for a first time snow shoeing. Had a blast with them. The will not be going on Let it go, anytime soon.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: one pair had defects and missing revets, had to return one pair
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fun
customer_reviews.text: Love them! My husband and I enjoy snowshoeing through the beautiful woods around our home
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 5-star customer service
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely great customer service!! I had an issue and they were extremely helpful and accommodating. I recommend flashtek.
customer_reviews.author: Suzy B

customer_reviews.title: easy to use- loved the package- poles and carrying case ...
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to use- loved the package- poles and carrying case included- very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Pam Belgarde

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use snowshoes
customer_reviews.text: Good quality , good gripping on the bottom, nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Straps could be longer for use with larger insulated boots
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: This snowshoe package comes with everything you need.
customer_reviews.text: First time snowshoeing and my choice of snowshoe couldn’t have been more perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Keely Walimaki

customer_reviews.title: Awesome snowshoes!
customer_reviews.text: The bindings keeps your boots securely fasten to the the snowshoe. Awesome snowshoes!
customer_reviews.author: FISH

customer_reviews.title: The shoes are easy on and easy off
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product as a gift to my brother. He loves it. The shoes are easy on and easy off.
customer_reviews.author: Yuan Peng

customer_reviews.title: These have worked great for me
customer_reviews.text: These have worked great for me. They are my first pair and I am a beginner, but they are a nice fit and easy to latch on. I'm considering getting more for family members.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: The front ratchet straps are a nice feature, just wish the rear boot strap was ...
customer_reviews.text: The front ratchet straps are a nice feature, just wish the rear boot strap was also a ratchet strap like a ski boot strap.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel T.

customer_reviews.title: Good basic snowshoe at decent price
customer_reviews.text: Worked just the way we hoped. Good basic snowshoe at decent price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good snowshoe
customer_reviews.text: I just took these out on a hike with my dogs. They did great! Fantastic traction and the poles are sturdy. Easy to put on and take off. Only this I would change is the ability to slide the show insert back to the second hole but still be able to have the shoe rotate when I step.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley C

customer_reviews.title: Cant beat it for value and performance
customer_reviews.text: Wife just found something that she likes to do in the snow! Now I'm one happy guy and I have my lady in the back country with me. Great traction on all surfaces and easy on off as well.
customer_reviews.author: Scotty

customer_reviews.title: They worked great!
customer_reviews.text: I used these to trek four miles in 7ft plus deep snow. They worked great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: She seemed to like them. They were given as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest Nelson

product_meta.title: FLASHTEK 21/25/30 Inches Light Weight Snowshoes for Women Men Youth Kids, Aluminum Terrain Snow Shoes with Trekking Poles and Carrying Tote Bag
feature_bullets: SIZES & WEIGHT CAPACITY: 21 inches snowshoes optimized weight range: 65 - 155 lbs / 30 - 70 kg；25 inches snowshoes optimized weight range: 110 - 220 lbs / 50 - 100 kg; 30 inches snowshoes optimized weight range: 150 - 260 lbs / 70 - 120 kg. (Load refers to total weight of user plus anything they are carrying such as pack, equipment, etc.)

DESIGN: Ergonomic and streamlined design and a slightly upturned rounded tail, the snowshoes ensure a comfortable and easy walk for your hiking and climbing. Meet max floatation and fast movement in heavy snow condition.
FUNCTION: Fast pull binding system easy entry and fast-lock allow your winter boots put on and off quickly. It can fit a wide range of shoes size from 35-45 EUR.
MATERIALS: Long lasting lightweight 6000 Series aircraft aluminum frame. DuPont pivot and environmental HDPE decking. Forged aluminum alloy crampons
PACK: One pair of snowshoes + one pair of Trekking poles + one nylon carrying bag.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
